statements: SELECT * FROM hacked_banking_information
SELECT victim_id, victim_name FROM hacked_banking_information ORDER BY victim_name DESC
SELECT account_number, balance FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT victim_id, balance FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE victim_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE victim_id = 123
SELECT * FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY victim_name DESC;
SELECT victim_name, account_number FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE account_number LIKE '%45%' ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT victim_id, victim_name, balance FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE victim_name LIKE 'A%' OR balance < 5000;
SELECT * FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE account_number = '9876543210' AND balance > 500 ORDER BY victim_id ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT victim_name, account_number, balance FROM hacked_banking_information WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM hacked_accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM hacked_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, recipient_account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_holder_name DESC
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000 AND account_holder_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000

SELECT account_holder_name, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM hacked_accounts JOIN transactions ON hacked_accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id GROUP BY account_holder_name ORDER BY total_transactions DESC

SELECT account_holder_name, AVG(amount) AS average_transaction FROM hacked_accounts JOIN transactions ON hacked_accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id GROUP BY account_holder_name HAVING AVG(amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM hacked_bank_accounts;
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM hacked_bank_accounts WHERE balance > 0;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM hacked_bank_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_holder, account_number, balance FROM hacked_bank_accounts WHERE account_holder LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hacked_bank_accounts;
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM hacked_bank_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT account_holder FROM hacked_bank_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM hacked_bank_accounts GROUP BY account_holder HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM hacked_accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM transfer_records ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, transfer_amount FROM transfer_records WHERE transfer_amount > 1000;
SELECT username, last_login FROM login_credentials WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hacked_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM hacked_accounts WHERE account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_holder_name ASC;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_id, receiver_id, transfer_amount, transfer_date FROM transfer_records WHERE transfer_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT lc.username, sl.log_message FROM login_credentials lc INNER JOIN security_logs sl ON lc.user_id = sl.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Victims;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email, victim_address FROM Victims;
SELECT hacker_name, hacker_email FROM Hackers;
SELECT transfer_amount, transfer_date FROM TransferLogs ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT account_owner, account_balance FROM BankAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email FROM Victims;
SELECT hacker_name, hacker_email, hacker_phone FROM Hackers WHERE hacker_address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT account_owner, account_balance FROM BankAccounts WHERE account_status = TRUE ORDER BY account_balance DESC;

SELECT hacker_name, victim_name, transfer_amount, transfer_date FROM Hackers JOIN TransferLogs ON Hackers.hacker_id = TransferLogs.hacker_id JOIN Victims ON Victims.victim_id = TransferLogs.victim_id;

SELECT transaction_id, account_owner, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM TransactionHistory JOIN BankAccounts ON TransactionHistory.account_id = BankAccounts.account_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
